Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on the Impact of a Reference Guide for Bariatric Surgery Nursing Care

Trial_Design.evidence: A quasi-experimental design was conducted at Mansoura University Hospital

Intervention.evidence: Participants were divided into two groups: 78 patients before and 78 after the guide's implementation

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to assess the impact of a reference guide on nurses' knowledge and patient satisfaction

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the improvement in nurses' knowledge and patient satisfaction, measured over a 9-month period

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation and allocation concealment methods were not applicable

Number_Analysed.evidence: Participants were divided into two groups: 78 patients before and 78 after the guide's implementation

Result_Outcome.evidence: the percentage of nurses with good knowledge increased from 10.3% to 80.8%, and poor self-reported practices decreased from 80.8% to 5.1%
